# any-agent

## Docs

- [Introduction](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/index.md): Requirements - Installation - For AI Systems
- [Agents - Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/index.md): Defining Agents - Running Agents
- [Agents - Callbacks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/callbacks.md): Context - Implementing Callbacks - Default Callbacks - Providing your own Callbacks - Example: Offloading sensitive information - Example: Limit the number of steps
- [Agents - Frameworks - Agno](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/frameworks/agno.md): Default Agent Type - Default Model Type
- [Agents - Frameworks - Google Adk](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/frameworks/google_adk.md): Default Agent Type - Default Model Type - Run args
- [Agents - Frameworks - Langchain](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/frameworks/langchain.md): Default Agent Type - Default Model Type - Run args
- [Agents - Frameworks - Llama Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/frameworks/llama_index.md): Default Agent Type - Default Model Type
- [Agents - Frameworks - Openai](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/frameworks/openai.md): Default Agent Type - Default Model Type - Run args
- [Agents - Frameworks - Smolagents](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/frameworks/smolagents.md): Default Agent Type - Default Model Type - Run args
- [Agents - Frameworks - Tinyagent](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/frameworks/tinyagent.md): Examples
- [Agents - Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/agents/tools.md): Callables - MCP - Using Agents-As-Tools
- [Tracing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/tracing.md): Console - Spans - Dumping to File - Adding an OpenTelemetry exporter
- [Evaluation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/evaluation.md): Choosing the Right Evaluation Method - Custom Code Evaluation - LlmJudge - AgentJudge - Custom Output Types
- [Serving](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/serving.md): Configuring and Serving Agents - Using the served agents - More Examples
- [Api - Agent](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/api/agent.md): Agent
- [Api - Callbacks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/api/callbacks.md)

- [Api - Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/api/tools.md)
- [Api - Tracing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-agent/refs/heads/main/docs/api/tracing.md)
